resources.string: A small, rocky planet blanketed in a thick layer of yellowish clouds.
A small, rocky planet which supports a variety of life!
A small, rocky planet which is cold and lifeless.
A giant gas planet which is made up of about 90% hydrogen and 10% helium.
A giant gas planet which is made up of about 75% hydrogen and 25% helium.
A giant gas planet which is made up of mostly rock and various ices.
A giant gas planet which is most likely made up of various \"ices\" and rock.
A small, icy "dwarf planet". Scientists are still unsure as to exactly what it\'s made of.
